title: Welcome
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
When we were alone, you were treating me like I was your queen
Now I can't get you on the phone
Who you tryna be?
[Pre-Chorus]
Two-faced, no good, dirty piece of shit
Don't come back, scumbag, get to lickin' again
I see right through that pretty little grin
But I've had enough
[Chorus]
Welcome to the motherfuckin' chorus
Where it don't even matter that you're gorgeous
Where lovin' isn't cheap, you can't afford this
No, no, no, I don't need you
Welcome to the moment where I leave you
[Post-Chorus]
Welcome to the motherfucking-
(Bounce!)
[Verse 2]
You see, it's pretty clear that you've been putting on a show
Now I'll make you disappear
Boy, it's time to go

[Pre-Chorus]
Two-faced, no good, dirty piece of shit
Don't come back, scumbag, get to lickin' again
I see right through that pretty little grin
But I've had enough
[Chorus]
Welcome to the motherfuckin' chorus
Where it don't even matter that you're gorgeous
Where lovin' isn't cheap, you can't afford this
No, no, no, I don't need you
Welcome to the moment where I leave you
[Post-Chorus]
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, oh)
Welcome to the, welcome to the
(Ooh, ooh, ooh)
(Ooh, ooh, ooh)
(Motherfuckin')
(Hey!)
(Motherfuckin')
[Chorus]
Welcome to the motherfuckin' chorus
Where it don't even matter that you're gorgeous
Where lovin' isn't cheap, you can't afford this
No, no, no, I don't need you
Welcome to the moment where I leave you

[Post-Chorus]
(Oh, oh, oh)
(Oh, oh, oh)
Welcome to the, welcome to the
(Ooh, ooh, ooh)
(Ooh, ooh, ooh)
